messages.title: Grahame campaigns against defence cuts.
messages.content: At a meeting with the Save RAF Cottesmore campaign team in Oakham, Grahame, a former Royal Navy officer, said, 'This proposed closure of RAF Cottesmore and early withdrawal of a RAF Harrier Squadron, without a proper strategic defence review, will not only affect the UK's ability to defend itself in time of war but will also have a disastrous effect on the local Rutland economy.'

messages.title: Our NHS: at risk with the Conservatives
messages.content: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. Daily Mail, Jan 2010. 'We've lived the NHS mistake for 60 years now ... The reality is [the NHS] hasn't worked that has made people ill.' Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners. Daily Telegraph, Dec 2008. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS. The Guardian, Summer 2009.

messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

messages.title: Help the Lib Dems win
messages.content: Please help Grahame Hudson and the local Liberal Democrats speak up for local people by filling in and returning the form below.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes the closure of RAF Cottesmore and early withdrawal of RAF Harrier Squadron, emphasizing the need for a proper strategic defence review and highlighting the impact on UK's defence and local economy.
Raises concerns about the Conservatives' handling of the NHS, suggesting risks of privatisation and referencing various media reports and statements by Conservative figures.

issues.health: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss. Daily Mail, Jan 2010. 'We've lived the NHS mistake for 60 years now ... The reality is [the NHS] hasn't worked that has made people ill.' Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009. David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners. Daily Telegraph, Dec 2008. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS. The Guardian, Summer 2009.

images.caption: Grahame Hudson signs the Save RAF Cottesmore petition.
